documentation.author: Cerner Model
documentation.purpose: This rule is needed to identify Outpatient Therapy patients with Medicare (or other qualifying insurances) that require G-Code documentation.
documentation.explanation: This rule will trigger an initial G-Code task for patient admitted to Outpatient Therapy with Medicare (or other qualifying insurances that require G-Codes) listed in one of their insurance profiles, including primary, secondary, tertiary, etc.
documentation.impact:
Template E1 needs to be reinstantiated with appropriate Rehab nursing units in the client domain.
Template L2 needs to be reinstantiated with appropriate encounter types for which this rule will fire.
Template L3 needs to be reinstantiated with appropriate Financial Class types for which this rule will fire.
Template L4 needs to be modified with local code values for qualifying insurances. Insert local code values for Financial Class Code between the parenthesis here, and separate with commas if there are multiple values-> " HP.FINANCIAL_CLASS_CD IN (XXXXX,XXXXX,XXXXX)"

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PT_ACTION_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient is ACTION and the SPECIFIC ACTION_DETAIL QUALIFIER DETAIL_VALUE

statements.statement:
select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "*ANY ACTION" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Admitted" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Encounter Combined" elseif (d.seq = 4) "Person Combined" elseif (d.seq = 5) "Person Encounter Combined" elseif (d.seq = 6) "Discharged" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Transfered" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Any patient event" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Current admit date defined, previous admit date is not defined" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Current and previous encounter id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 4) "Current and previous person id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 5) "Current and previous person & encounter id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 6) "Current discharged date is defined but previous discharge date is not" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Current and previous location codes differ" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 7)
order by action

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "current" elseif (d.seq = 2) "previous" elseif (d.seq = 3) "current or previous" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Current or new admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Previous admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Check before and after values" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 3)
order by d.seq

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "is" elseif (d.seq = 2) "is not" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1)
from (dummyt d with seq = 2)
order by d.seq

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CODED_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_UNITS_OF_MEASURE on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert. OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_RESULT_UNITS (with OPT_NUM_DEC_PLACES decimal places) on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert.OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

values.value: Morton Plant North Bay Hospital ==> North Bay Hospital ==> NB Mitchell-OT
Morton Plant North Bay Hospital ==> North Bay Hospital ==> NB Mitchell-PT
Morton Plant North Bay Hospital ==> North Bay Hospital ==> NB Mitchell-ST
To FullAudit for this module only

value.value: SELECT HP.ACTIVE_IND FROM ENCNTR_PLAN_RELTN E, HEALTH_PLAN HP PLAN E WHERE E.ENCNTR_ID = @ENCOUNTERID:{patInfo} JOIN HP WHERE E.HEALTH_PLAN_ID = HP.HEALTH_PLAN_ID AND HP.FINANCIAL_CLASS_CD IN (634778.00,634777.00,634776.00)@NEWLINEDETAIL log_misc1 = "FOUND" go
